entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
